data.title: Edgar Award Winners
data.text:
Dance Hall of the Dead

By: Tony Hillerman

Narrated by: Michael Ansara

Length: 2 hrs and 52 mins

Abridged

Overall

4 out of 5 stars 845

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 650

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 644

A Zuni Indian boy dies in a bizarre ritual slaying - and his best friend, a Navajo youth, is missing...

3 out of 5 stars

Pace was off

By James on 07-18-04

The Laughing Policeman

A Martin Beck Police Mystery

By: Maj Sjöwall, Per Wahlöö

Narrated by: Tom Weiner

Length: 6 hrs and 41 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4 out of 5 stars 430

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 316

Story

4 out of 5 stars 313

On a cold and rainy Stockholm night, nine bus riders are gunned down by an unknown assassin. The anxious press quickly dubs him a madman....

3 out of 5 stars

Review - Laughing Policeman

By Regina on 05-19-10

In Cold Blood

By: Truman Capote

Narrated by: Scott Brick

Length: 14 hrs and 27 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 15,041

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 12,350

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 12,334

On November 15, 1959, in the small town of Holcomb, Kansas, four members of the Clutter family were savagely murdered by blasts from a shotgun held a few inches from their faces. There was no apparent motive for the crime, and there were almost no clues....

5 out of 5 stars

Still the Best

By Lisa on 01-10-06
